Title: The Primary Threat
Description:
There are far too many vulnerable eggs to secure. If the enemy breaks through, all is lost!

I am sure our guards are mustering on the field to push them back. Speak to Commander Lethanak, and he will use your strength where it will be most helpful.
ObjectivesText: Find Commander Lethanak at the Flashfrost Assault.
RewardText: I will use every weapon in my arsenal to stop these foes.
